bug.author: caiopavanelli
bug.summary: Issue when mounting the same bucket twice with different names
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: v2.2.0 Describe the bug If a bucket is mounted twice, with different names, Alluxio responds with success message but the action is not actually performed. To Reproduce <denchmark-code>$ alluxio fs mount /various s3://alluxesto/various/ Mounted s3://alluxesto/various at /various
$ alluxio fs mount /variouzz s3://alluxesto/various/ Mounted s3://alluxesto/various at /various </denchmark-code>
Expected behavior Alluxio should either mount the second time or return an error informing the operation cannot be done. Urgency NORMAL Additional context
